about_the_game:
"Voxel Party: Independent Game Publisher" is a creative and fun voxel art style game that tells the daily story of an independent game publishing company. Players will experience how to grow from a small indie publishing team into a leader in the industry. Each level represents a game published by the company, filled with various fun puzzles and challenges.

Game Background and Gameplay

The core concept of the game revolves around managing an independent game publisher. Players progress the publisher's development by completing mini-game scenarios. Each scenario consists of 15 mini-games, where the player's task is to find hidden stars and pass through the levels. Each mini-game has a unique gameplay style, covering different operations and puzzle elements, which not only test the player's reflexes but also require strategic thinking.

Each time players successfully complete a set of mini-games (15 mini-games make up one theme), they will earn star coins. These coins can be used to upgrade their publishing company, purchase more advanced equipment, or hire better team members. The goal is to continuously improve the company's scale and abilities, ultimately becoming a great independent game publishing team.

Game Features

  • Voxel Art Style: The game features a voxel-based visual design, offering players a unique and creative gaming experience. Each level and character is designed with simple, cute cube shapes, full of charm and personality.

  • Multiple Mini-Games: Each theme includes 15 mini-games, each designed uniquely. Players must solve different puzzles and perform various tasks to find hidden stars and successfully pass each level.

  • Publisher Growth: Players accumulate star coins by completing mini-games, which can be used to upgrade the publisher’s facilities, such as purchasing advanced development equipment or hiring top-notch team members. These factors will directly impact the publisher's development and the overall progression of the game.

  • Creation and Sharing: The game provides a powerful online editor, allowing players to create their own mini-games via a web-based editor and share them with others. This feature not only lets players enjoy the game but also gives them the opportunity to create new content and expand the game world according to their preferences.

  • Engaging Stories and Events: Behind each theme, there is an interesting story or event. Players will follow the story’s progression to unlock new levels and gameplay, encountering more challenges along the way.

Goals and Vision

The goal of "Voxel Party: Independent Game Publisher" is not only to allow players to complete tasks but also to spark their creativity. By offering an easy-to-use editor, the game encourages players to use their imagination to create new mini-games and share them with others. The development team’s dream is for everyone to experience the joy of creation and to provide a platform for independent game developers to showcase their work.

Target Audience

  • Players who enjoy fun and easy mini-games

  • Players interested in the independent game publishing process

  • Players who enjoy creating, editing, and sharing their own content

  • Players who love voxel art style and puzzle elements

Conclusion

"Voxel Party: Independent Game Publisher" is not only a game full of creativity and challenges but also an interactive platform where players can experience independent game development and creation. Through rich levels and the game editor, players can enjoy the game while also unleashing their creative potential.
